question: Which two about WAR files are true? (Choose two.)

options.A: WAR files must be located in the web application library directory.
options.B: WAR files must contain the web application deployment descriptor.
options.C: WAR files must be created by using archive tools designed specifically for that purpose.
options.D: The web container must serve the content of any META-INF directory located in a WAR file.
options.E: The web container must allow access to resources in JARs in the web application library directory.
